name: Crystal Jump (kiakkers)
description:
Welcome to the Temple Ruins!

In Crystal Jump, you have to collect as many crystals and shoot as many targets as you can.

Try to reach the end without falling off the islands!

How to play:

  • WASD to move.
  • Mouse to look around.
  • Spacebar to jump.
  • Left mouse click to shoot.

Music from Zapslat and Bensound.
